results.title: TET2 Drives 5hmc Marking of GATA6 and Epigenetically Defines Pancreatic Ductal Adenocarcinoma Transcriptional Subtypes.
results.text_hl: Importantly, enhancing @GENE_TET2 @GENE_54790 @@@TET2@@@ stability using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ascorbic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001205 @@@vitamin C@@@/@CHEMICAL_Ascorbic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001205 @@@ascorbic acid@@@ restores @CHEMICAL_5_hydroxymethylcytosine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C011865 @@@5hmc@@@ and @GENE_GATA6 @GENE_2627 @@@GATA6@@@ levels, reverting @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Squamous_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018307 @@@squamous-like tumor@@@ phenotypes and WNT-dependence in vitro and in vivo.

results.title: Redox-dependent modulation of metformin contributes to enhanced sensitivity of esophageal squamous cell carcinoma to cisplatin

results.title: Disulfiram with or without metformin inhibits oesophageal squamous cell carcinoma in vivo.

results.title: Caffeic Acid and Metformin Inhibit Invasive Phenotype Induced by TGF-beta1 in C-4I and HTB-35/SiHa Human Cervical Squamous Carcinoma Cells by Acting on Different Molecular Targets
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to evaluate the influence of natural compound @CHEMICAL_caffeic_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C040048 @@@Caffeic Acid@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@CA@@@) alone and in combination with antidiabetic drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (@GENE_SLTM @GENE_79811 @@@Met@@@) on metastatic progression of two @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Squamous_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018307 @@@cervical squamous cell cancer@@@ lines, @CELLLINE_CVCL:2253 @@@C-4I@@@ and @CELLLINE_CVCL:A8FQ @@@HTB-35/SiHa@@@ cells.
